English: Looks like you've made some reliable allies.
Chinese: 還真是交到了很可靠的夥伴啊。
German:
Du scheinst ein paar verlässliche Verbündete
gefunden zu haben.

English:
You got it. Looks like Shiga wasn't the hacker
you're after. I'm sad to hear it myself.
Chinese:
沒錯，志賀似乎不是你正在追的那位駭客。
我也感到很可惜。
Korean:
그래. 시가는 네가 쫓는 해커가 아니었던 모양이군.
나도 유감스럽다
German:
Jawohl. Shiga war wohl nicht der Hacker, den du
suchst. Das finde ich auch schade.

English: What, you think it's strange that I know about it?
Chinese: 覺得我會知道很不可思議嗎？
German: Wie, findest du es seltsam, dass ich das weiß?

English:
I know the ins and outs of Kowloon. It's easy to
get my hands on that much info.
Chinese:
我對Kowloon的時事很了解呢，
得到這種消息對我來說是小事一件。
Korean:
나는 쿠롱의 사정을 잘 알고 있거든.
이 정도의 정보를 입수하는 건 간단해
German:
Ich kenne Kowloon wie meine Westentasche.
Diese Informationen bekomme ich mit links.

English:
Plus Hudie itself is pretty famous among
hackers. They're Zaxon's confidants, you see.
Chinese:
而且hudie在駭客之間也算是有名，
畢竟是那個Zaxon的心腹呢。
Korean:
게다가 후디에는 해커들 사이에서 나름대로 유명하지.
어쨌든 그 잭슨의 심복이니까
German:
Hudie ist außerdem recht bekannt unter
Hackern. Vertraute von Zaxon, verstehst du?

English:
...Let me give you some advice. Don't go trusting
those guys too much.
Chinese:
……我就好心一點給你忠告吧，
不要太相信他們比較好。
Korean:
……너를 위해 충고하지.
그들을 너무 믿지 않는 편이 좋아
German:
... Ich gebe dir einen Rat. Vertraue diesen Leuten
nicht zu sehr.

English:
Those guys are hackers, after all. You have no
idea what they're up to behind the scenes.
Chinese:
他們終究是駭客，
背後在偷偷做些什麼也無從得知呢。
Korean:
어차피 그들도 해커다.
뒤에서 뭘 꾸미고 있는지 알 수 없어
German:
Sie sind schließlich Hacker. Du weißt nicht, was
sie hinter den Kulissen treiben.

English: It was wise of you not to mention me.
Chinese: 不要向他們提起我，這才是賢明之舉喔。
Korean: 나에 대해서도 말하지 않는 편이 현명하다
German: Es war schlau von dir, mich nicht zu erwähnen.

English:
I don't know what they told you, but don't be
tricked by their promises.
Chinese:
我不曉得他們對你說了什麼，
但不要被他們的甜言蜜語給騙了。
Korean: 네게 무슨 말을 했는지는 모르겠지만 그들의 달콤한 말에 속지 마라
German:
Ich weiß nicht, was sie dir gesagt haben, aber
falle nicht auf ihre Versprechen herein.

English:
Who am I, you ask? Heh heh...I'm your ally. Your
one and only ally, actually.
Chinese:
你問我是誰？
呵呵……我是你的夥伴喔，唯一的呢。
Korean:
내가 누구냐고?
후후……네 편이야. 유일한, 말이지
German:
Wer ich bin, willst du wissen? Hehe ... dein
Verbündeter. Sogar dein einziger.

English: I'll send information on your next target.
Chinese: 傳給你下一位目標的情報吧。
German:
Ich schicke dir Informationen zu deinem nächsten
Ziel.

Chinese: 目標的名字叫做「茅場透」。

English:
He abuses personal information flowing in the
darkness through account raiding to extort money
from people and businesses.
Chinese:
是一位藉著帳號狩獵，濫用在黑市流通的個人資訊，
再跑去勒索企業跟一般用戶的男人。
Korean:
계정 사냥으로 어둠에 흘러든 개인 정보를 악용해
기업이나 개인으로부터 돈을 뜯어내는 남자다
German:
Er missbraucht persönliche Daten, die er durch
Kontenraub erhält, um Geld von Personen und
Unternehmen zu erpressen.

English:
He has an impressive collection of accounts.
Try and track him down.
Chinese:
他收集了各式各樣的帳號。
去追追看吧。
Korean:
녀석에게는 온갖 계정이 모여들지.
추적해보는게 좋아
German:
Er hat eine beeindruckende Kontensammlung.
Versuche, ihn zu finden.

English: (K... What in the world could he be after?)
German: (K ... Auf was hat er es bloß abgesehen?)
